name: Iron Serpent
description: A colossal armored train that traverses the continent. Controlled by Automata Lily.

locations.name: Caboose
locations.description: The rear of the train. The wind is strong here.

locations.name: Cargo Bay 1
locations.description: Filled with crates of weapons. Enemy patrols are frequent.

locations.name: Dining Car
locations.description: A luxurious dining area, now overrun by security bots.

locations.name: Engine Room
locations.description: The heart of the train. Lily awaits here.
